# Average Joes Lab

> Democratizing research for citizen scientists. Open science by ordinary people.

## About

Average Joes Lab is a community-driven platform that makes scientific research accessible to everyone, regardless of background or formal education. We provide learning paths, research papers, and community support for citizen researchers worldwide.

## Mission

- Democratize Research: Make the tools and knowledge of scientific inquiry accessible to all
- Empower Learners: Provide practical, step-by-step guidance to conduct research effectively
- Foster Community: Build a supportive and collaborative environment for citizen scientists
- Champion Open Science: Advocate for transparency, reproducibility, and open sharing of research

- Home: https://averagejoeslab.com/

- Research Engineering: https://averagejoeslab.com/learn/research-engineering/getting-started/

- Internal Papers: https://averagejoeslab.com/internal-papers/
- External Papers: https://averagejoeslab.com/external-papers/
- Blog: https://averagejoeslab.com/blog/
